LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.EnableFarmingHysteresi: Allow {0} when the amount gets lower than the configured lower amount and disallow {0} when it gets above the configured upper amount.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.UseGlobalValuesDesc: For all zones and hydroponics basins of the same crop with this setting enabled, they will share the same bound values.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.EnabledByDefault: Growing zones and hydroponic basins enable hysteresis upon placement
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.UseGlobalValuesByDefau: Use global hysteresis values by default
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.ShowOldCommandsTooltip: In version 0.6, the mod switched from using command buttons to a dialog for configuring hysteresis parameters. Enable this setting to also show the old command buttons.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.ShowHysteresisMainTabT: Disabling this setting hides the Hysteresis tab from the game.\n\nWhile it is currently only used as a convenient location to configure global hysteresis values in one place, there are plans to add more features to this tab later. Hiding it will thus prevent access to these features and is generally not recommended.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.ConfigureHysteresisDes: Configure hysteresis parameters such as the upper and lower bounds.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.DecrementLowerHysteres: Decrement the lower bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.IncrementLowerHysteres: Increment the lower bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.DecrementUpperHysteres: Decrement the upper bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.IncrementUpperHysteres: Increment the upper bound by {0} (Hold {1} for x10, {2} for x100)
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.LowerBound: Start {3} {0} when there are fewer than {1} {2} in storage
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.UpperBound: Stop {3} {0} when there are more than {1} {2} in storage
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.LatchModeDesc.Unknown: Unknown. This is a bug unless the zone was just created or hysteresis was just enabled.
LanguageData.FarmingHysteresis.LatchModeDesc.BelowLow: Lower than the lower bound. Allowing {0}.
